string.name: desc
string.value: A special effect in which you'll see a brightly smiling sun floating over you. On the KeyConfig, configure this on a button of your choice to turn the effect on/off.

string.name: desc
string.value: A special effect in which you'll see a brightly smiling moon floating around in a sea of stars over you. On the KeyConfig, configure this on a button of your choice to turn the effect on/off.

string.name: desc
string.value: A special effect in which you'll see a full 7-color rainbow floating above you. Designate a HotKey to turn the effect on/off.

string.name: desc
string.value: A special effect that calls Lilly, the cute little devil, to float along next to you! You can bind this effect to a key to easily turn the effect on and off.

string.name: desc
string.value: A special effect that shows a submarine under the water. Designate a HotKey to turn the effect on/off.

string.name: desc

string.value: A special effect that appears Chinese Falg. Designate a HotKey to turn the effect on/off.

string.name: desc
string.value: A special effect in which you'll see two babies floating on the cloud as a sign of friendship. Designate a HotKey to turn the effect on/off.

string.name: desc

string.name: desc
string.value: A siren effect that can be used under emergencies. Designate a HotKey to turn the effect ON/OFF.

string.value: This creepy skull was discovered near even creepier remains. Looks like you're stuck with this macabre tchotchke until you decide to dump it. You can bind this effect to a key to easily turn the effect on and off.

string.value: A number of twinkling stars surrounds the character in this special effect.

string.name: desc

string.name: desc
string.value: Set up this special store on the Free Market, and this Coffeehouse, doubling as the Hired Merchant, will be a place that sells the items for the owner, even if the owner does not log on to the game. #cIf an item is sold, the owner will be notified through the chat window.#

string.name: desc
string.value: Set up this store on the Free Market, and this Granny will sell items for you, even while you are logged out. If you list items that #cyou wish to purchase#, another player can sell those items at this shop. #cWhen an item is sold, you will be notified via chat window.# \n#cUnpurchaseable Items#: Equipment items and cash items with expirations.

string.name: desc
string.value: Set up this store on the Free Market, and this Granny will sell items for you, even while you are logged out. If you list items that #cyou wish to purchase#, another player can sell those items at this shop. #cWhen an item is sold, you will be notified via chat window.# \n#cUnpurchaseable Items#: Equipment items and cash items with expirations.

string.name: desc
string.value: Set up this special store in the Free Market! This Coffehouse, which doubles as a Hired Merchant, will sell your items, even if you do not log into the game. #cIf an item is sold, you will be notified through the chat window.#

string.name: desc
string.value: Open this store in the Free Market, and Jeweler Aamina will sell items for you, even while you are logged out. If you list items that #cyou wish to purchase#, another player can sell those items to your shop. #cWhen an item is sold, you will be notified via chat window.# \n#cUnpurchaseable Items#: Equipment items and cash items with expirations.

string.name: desc
string.value: Set up this store on the Free Market and Granny will sell your items for you, even while you are logged out. In addition, if you list items that #cyou wish to purchase#, another player can sell those items at this shop. #cWhen an item is sold, you will be notified via chat window.# \n#cUnpurchaseable Items#: Equipment items and cash items with expirations. \nThe Granny's Snack Shack of World Discount Sale Tab can be purchased #c1 Time#per Nexon ID.

string.name: desc

string.name: desc
string.value: Set up this store in the Free Market, and this Diamond-exclusive shop will sell items for you, even while you are logged out. If you list items that #cyou wish to purchase#, another player can sell those items at this shop. #cWhen an item is sold, you will be notified via chat window.# \n#cUnpurchaseable Items#: Equipment and cash items with expirations.\n#cYou can use this item until the last day of the month you received it.#

string.name: desc
string.value: A rock that can memorize 5 maps, and then allow you to #cteleport to the memorized maps# at any time. It can be used to #cmove to the map where a particular character is# as long as they're in your world and channel. This item cannot be used for moving to #cMirror World#. This item is consumed upon use.

string.name: desc
string.value: By drinking sweet refreshing #cCoca-Cola#, it ables you to #cteleport to one of the remembered maps#. You can also #cteleport to the map where specific character is located# in the same channel. Unable the teleport to the maps where teleport is limited.

string.name: desc
string.value: #cA rock which allows you to teleport between continents#. It can be used to #cmove to the map where a particular character is# as long as they're in your channel. Excluding maps that are restricted from teleporting into, up to #c10# maps can be registered. This item cannot be used for moving to #cMirror World#. This item is consumed upon use.

string.name: desc
string.value:
#cA rock which allows you to teleport between continents#. It can be used to #cmove to the map where a particular character is# as long as they're in your channel. You can even teleport to a town that you have not yet visited. Excluding maps that are restricted from teleporting into, up to #c13# maps can be registered.
#c<Towns that you can teleport to>#
#cHenesys, Ellinia, Perion, Kerning City, Nautilus, Orbis, Ludibrium, Aquarium, Leafre, Mu Lung, Ariant, Edelstein#.
This item cannot be used for moving to #cMirror World#.

string.value: Warps you to wherever you want! Just select your destination on the World Map appears. Does not work in all areas. \nCooldown: 30 minutes

string.name: name
string.value: MVP World Map Warp Drive (1 Day)

string.name: desc
string.value: Warps you to your desired location on the World Map upon use. Just select your destination when the World Map appears. Warping only works in certain areas. \nCooldown: 5 minutes

string.name: name
string.value: PC Cafe World Map Warp Drive

string.name: desc
string.value: Warps you to your desired location on the World Map. Just select your destination when the World Map appears. #cWarping only works in certain areas. \nCooldown: 15 minutes

string.name: desc
string.value: Warps you to your desired location on the World Map upon use. Just select your destination from the World Map. Warping only works in certain areas. \nCooldown: 5 minutes \nUsable until the end of the month in which the Monthly Mega Pack is claimed.

string.name: desc
string.value: Warps you to your desired location on the World Map upon use. Just select your destination when the World Map appears.#c Warping only works in certain areas.# \nCooldown: 30 minutes

string.name: desc
string.value: Warps you to your desired location on the World Map upon use. Just select your destination when the World Map appears.#c There is no cooldown, and 1 scroll is used per use.#

string.name: desc
string.value: Warps you to your desired location on the World Map upon use. Just select your destination when the World Map appears.#c There is no cooldown, and 1 scroll is used per use.#

string.name: desc
string.value: This #cscroll allows you to move 1 AP from one stat to another#. The lowest AP level that a stat can have is 4

string.name: name
string.value: Job Adv 1 Skill SP Reset Scroll

string.name: desc
string.value: This #cscroll allows you to move 1 SP from one 1st job advancement skill to another#. Dual Blades can move 1st job SP to 1st and 1+ skills. #cZeros# cannot use this scroll.

string.name: name
string.value: Job Adv 2 Skill SP Reset Scroll

string.name: desc
string.value: This #cscroll allows you to move 1 SP from one 2nd job advancement skill to another#. If you put the SP into a 1st job skill after taking your 2nd job advancement, you can also move that. Dual Blades can move 1+ and 2nd job advancement skills. #cZeros# cannot use this scroll.

string.name: name
string.value: Job Adv 3 Skill SP Reset Scroll

string.name: desc
string.value: This #cscroll allows you to move 1 SP from one 3rd job advancement skill to another#. If you put the SP into a 1st or 2nd job skill after taking your 3rd job advancement, you can also move that. Dual Blades can move 2+ and 3rd job advancement skills. #cZeros# cannot use this scroll.

string.name: name
string.value: Job Adv 4 Skill SP Reset Scroll

string.name: desc
string.value: This #cscroll allows you to move 1 SP from one 4th job advancement skill to another#. If you put the SP into a 1st, 2nd, or 3rd job skill after taking your 4th job advancement, you can also move that. #cZeros# can use this scroll.

string.name: desc
string.value: Only for Evan. This scroll allows you to #creset 1 SP from a 1st or 2nd Job Skill.#

string.name: desc
string.value: Only for Evan. This scroll allows you to #creset 1 SP from a 3rd or 4th Job Skill.#

string.name: desc
string.value: Only for Evan. This scroll allows you to #creset 1 SP from a 5th or 6th Job Skill.#

string.name: desc
string.value: Only for Evan. This scroll allows you to #creset 1 SP from a 7th or 8th Job Skill.#

string.name: desc
string.value: Only for Evan. This scroll allows you to #creset 1 SP from a 9th or 10th Job Skill.#

string.name: desc
string.value: #cResets all stats#, excluding the #cAP invested in HP/MP#.

string.name: desc
string.value: When used, #call skills, excluding beginner skills, will be reset#.

string.name: desc
string.value:
Engraves the owner's name on a piece of equipment. #cDrag the item icon on to the equipment piece of your choice# to engrave your character's name on it. 
Cannot be used on previously engraved equipment.
If used on an item with a crafter's name attached, #cthe crafter's name will be overwritten with the newest name#. 
Cannot be used on Zero weapons.

string.name: desc
string.value: Double-click the lock and drag an item into the slot to prevent non-quest items from being #cvendor traded, exchanged, dropped, scrolled, or used by some cash items#.

string.name: desc
string.value: An equipment needed to open the #ceggs from pigme#. Pigme eggs canve incubated by double clicking the incubator.

string.name: desc
string.value: An odd-looking contraption that cracks #cPeanuts#. Double-click the Peanut Machine to use it.

string.name: desc
string.value: A device used to melt #cIce Cubes#. Double-click the microwave to use it.

string.name: desc
string.value: A device needed to #chatch a Pygmy Egg#. You can hatch a Pygmy Egg by double clicking on the Incubator. The Incubator will give you a better chance of obtaining valuable items.

string.name: desc
string.value: A jeweled music box that once belonged to a legendary hero of the past. Can be opened with a #cHero's Key#, dropped by monsters and sold at Elluel General Store. Use by double-clicking on the music box.

string.name: desc
string.value: An enchanted crystalline sale. Acquire a Renegades Gem from defeated monsters and place it on the scale to obtain a special item.

string.name: desc
string.value: A magical tea pot. Add #cEnchanted Teabags#, dropped by monsters, or brew up special items. Double click on the tea pot to add teabags!

string.name: desc
string.value: You can erase the name engraved on equipment with the Item Tag item. #cDrag and drop this item onto the equipment you want to erase the name from.# \nCannot be used on Zero's weapon.

string.name: desc
string.value: A fancy hand mirror frame, missing the mirror glass. Find #cClear Mirror Glass# on monsters or purchase it from any General Store, and then place it on the frame to obtain a special item. Double-click on the Mermaid Mirror to place the glass.

string.name: desc
string.value: An amazing mirror which contains a few #cpopular equipment items and rare scrolls#. If you double-click on the Emerald Mirror, you can place #cEmerald Mirror Glass# on it to obtain a special item. You can get #cEmerald Mirror Glass# either from monster drops or by buying it at General Stores.

string.name: desc
string.value: A magical mirror that contains a marvelous assortment of #cchairs and Jag Jump Riding items#. If you double-click on the Spinel's Mirror, you can place #cSpinel's Mirror Glass# in it, which you can purchase from General Stores, to obtain a special item.

string.name: desc
string.value: Open this magical book to acquire #cpopular equipment, rare scrolls, and other rare items#. Double-click to open the book, or use a #cMagical Quill Pen# from the General Store.

string.name: desc
string.value: Open this book to acquire#c one of several rare items and a very powerful scroll.# Monsters will drop items when the book is double clicked or when the#c Philosopher's Quill Pen# from the General Store is used.

string.name: desc
string.value: Open this Infinity Book to acquire #cone of several surprising items#. Combine with an #cInfinity Quill Pen#, available at the General Store or dropped by monsters, to open.

string.name: desc
string.value: This Stone Seal Breaker can open the Magi-Stone Box, revealing #cone of several rare items#. You can acquire a #cMagi-Stone Box# via quests or by hunting monsters.

string.name: desc
string.value: Fill with Fairy Tears to gain one rare item. Double-click on the Fairy Vial to open the item window and drop in Fairy Tears. Fairy Tears can be acquired from monsters or from General Store in town.

string.name: desc
string.value: Combine this Chaos Purification Stone with the Chaos Box to acquire #cone of several rare items#. You can acquire a #cChaos Box# via quests or by hunting monsters.

string.name: desc
string.value: Combine with the Cryptic Chest to acquire #cone of many amazing items#!

string.name: desc
string.value: Place a Magic Note in this Magic Harp to get #cone rare item#. This also fills the the harp with a little bit of magic. When the harp is completely filled with magic, Fever Time starts! During Fever Time, your chances of obtaining the special item of the month significantly increases! To use, #cdouble-click# the harp and place a #cMagic Note# int he window that appears. You can get Magic Notes from hunting monsters or from General Stores in towns.

string.name: desc
string.value: Place a Miracle Stone into the Ancient Chest to get #cone random item#. You can find Ancient Chests while hunting monsters.

string.name: desc
string.value: #cDouble-click# on this harp, then drop an #cEnchanting Melody# in the window to unlock #cone rare item#. Each melody will fill the harp with a little bit of magic, and when it's full, Fever Time will begin! During Fever Time, you'll have a much better chance of unlocking the item of the month.

string.name: desc
string.value: Use Pandora's Key on Pandora's Box to unlock #cone rare item#. Every time you open Pandora's Box, you gain some magical power. Item Fever will trigger with enough power, #cgreatly increasing your chances to obtain special items#. Double-click Pandora's Box to use. You can get Pandora's Key from monsters or at the General Store.

string.name: desc
string.value: You can get#c one random item# from Andersen's Box. #cDouble-click# to use.

string.name: desc
string.value: Use Andersen's Key to get one random item from Andersen's Box. You can get Andersen's Key by hunting monsters or from General Stores in towns.

string.name: desc
string.value: Use Andersen's Chair Key to get one random chair from Andersen's Chair Box. You can get Andersen's Chair Key by hunting monsters or from General Stores in towns.

string.name: desc
string.value: Use Andersen's Mount Key to get one random mount from Andersen's Mount Box. You can get Andersen's Mount Key by hunting monsters or from General Stores in towns.

string.name: desc
string.value: It's glimmering with power! #cDouble-click# to get an item and a Golden Apple Slice.

string.name: desc
string.value: Double-click the lock and choose a non-quest item to prevent it from being #cvendor traded, exchanged, dropped, scrolled, or used by cash items#. #cItems cannot be unsealed for 7 days.# You cannot delete a character that is currently using an Item Guard. The Fusion Anvil can still be used on a locked item.

string.name: desc
string.value: Double-click the lock and choose a non-quest item to prevent it from being #cvendor traded, exchanged, dropped, scrolled, or used by cash items#. #cItems cannot be unsealed for 30 days.# You cannot delete a character that is currently using an Item Guard. The Fusion Anvil can still be used on a locked item.

string.name: desc
string.value: Double-click the lock and choose a non-quest item to prevent it from being #cvendor traded, exchanged, dropped, scrolled, or used by cash items#. #cItems cannot be unsealed for 90 days.# You cannot delete a character that is currently using an Item Guard. The Fusion Anvil can still be used on a locked item.

string.name: desc
string.value: Double-click the lock and choose a non-quest item to prevent it from being #cvendor traded, exchanged, dropped, scrolled, or used by cash items#. #cItems cannot be unsealed for 365 days.# You cannot delete a character that is currently using an Item Guard. The Fusion Anvil can still be used on a locked item.

string.name: desc
string.value: A mysterious cube, said to bring out the hidden potential of equipment. \n#cOnly usable on items graded Rare to Unique# \n#cMax Result: Unique#

string.name: desc
string.value: A mysterious cube, said to bring out the hidden potential of equipment. Has a greater chance of raising equipment rank than the Miracle Cube. \n#cOnly usable on items from Rare to Legendary#\n#cMax Result: Legendary#

string.name: desc
string.value: An #camazing# cube that resets equipment potential and has a chance to upgrade all potentials to the #chighest available grade#.\n#cOnly usable on items grades Rare to Legendary# \n#cMax Result: Legendary#

string.name: desc
string.value: An extremely powerful cube used to reset existing Potentials on your equipment. This cube has a greater chance to increase an item's rank than other Miracle Cubes, and it can #cupgrade all current Potentials to their highest possible values#. \n#cOnly works on items rank Rare to Legendary. # \n#cMax Result: Legendary#

string.name: desc
string.value:
A beautifully crafted cube that
 randomly reconfigures the
Potential on a piece of 
equipment. 
#cOnly usable on items from Rare to Legendary.# 
#cMax Result: Legendary #

string.name: desc
string.value: An elegant cube that randomly configures the Potential on a piece of equipment. The Black Cube offers you the chance to decide whether or not to #capply the new Potential to your item#. However, it does not influence Bonus Potentials. \n#cOnly usable on items from Rare to Legendary.# \n#cMax Result: Legendary# Black Cubes have a higher chance to raise your Potential rank than Red Cubes do.

string.name: desc
string.value: A cube of great wisdom. This cube allows the user to #cdecide if they want to accept the resulting Potential reset before it is completed#. Does not affect Bonus Potentials.\n#cOnly works on items rank Rare to Legendary. # \n#cMax Result: Legendary#

string.name: desc
string.value: A miracle cube that can only be used on Maple 8th Anniversary Crimson equipment. It can reveal higher potentials than normal miracle cubes.

string.name: desc
string.value:
A miracle cube that can only be used on 8th Maple Anniversary equipment. 
It reveals higher potentials than normal miracle cubes.
#cOnly usable on items from Rare to Legendary#
#cMax Result: Legendary#

string.name: desc
string.value: Maintains #cRank B# Inner Abilities when reconfiguring with a Circulator. \n#cDouble click# to protect the #cRank# of one Inner Ability that is currently Rank B. \nThe Rank protection effect will disappear after one #creconfiguration# with the Circulator.

string.name: desc
string.value: Maintains #cRank A# Inner Abilities when reconfiguring with a Circulator. \n#cDouble click# to protect the #cRank# of one Inner Ability that is currently Rank A. \nThe Rank protection effect will disappear after one #creconfiguration# with the Circulator.

string.name: desc
string.value: Allows you to take the #cstats and bonuses from one item (same gender)# and combine them with the #cappearance of another#. The effect is decided by the appearance item. There is a risk that items with similar appearances may be fused together! \nAvailable Equipment: Hats, eye accessories, face accessories, tops, bottoms, outfits, shoes, gloves, capes, weapons, shields, and kataras for a total of 12 types.\r\n#c* Warning: Cannot use Zero weapons, and using Zero equipment will be based on Alpha's character.#

string.name: desc
string.value: Allows you to change the look of a #cMedal# while keeping its stats by fusing it with another medal. The effect is decided by the appearance item. Beware! Items with a similar appearance may be fused together! Available Equipment: Medal

string.name: desc
string.value: Allows you to take the #cstats and bonuses from one item (same gender)# and combine them with the #cappearance of another#. The effect is decided by the appearance item. There is a risk that items with similar appearances may be fused together! \nAvailable Equipment: Hats, eye accessories, face accessories, tops, bottoms, outfits, shoes, gloves, capes, weapons, shields, and kataras for a total of 12 types.\r\n#c* Warning: Cannot use Zero weapons, and using Zero equipment will be based on Alpha's character.#

string.name: desc
string.value: Allows you to take the #cstats and bonuses from one item (same gender)# and combine them with the #cappearance of another#. The effect is decided by the appearance item. There is a risk that items with similar appearances may be fused together! \nAvailable Equipment: Hats, eye accessories, face accessories, tops, bottoms, outfits, shoes, gloves, capes, weapons, shields, and kataras for a total of 12 types.\r\n#c* Warning: Cannot use Zero weapons, and using Zero equipment will be based on Alpha's character.#

string.name: desc
string.value: A powerful cube that reconfigures a piece of equipment's Bonus Potential. Does not affect existing regular Potentials. \n#cOnly usable on items from Rare to Legendary#\n#cMax Result: Legendary#

string.name: desc
string.value: A powerful cube that reconfigures a piece of equipment's Bonus Potential. Does not affect existing regular Potentials. \n#cOnly usable on items from Rare to Legendary#\n#cMax Result: Legendary#

string.name: desc
string.value: This cube allows the user to #cdecide if they want to accept the resulting Bonus Potential reset before it is completed#. Does not affect Potentials.\n#cOnly works on items rank Rare to Legendary. # \n#cMax Result: Legendary#

string.name: desc
string.value: #cDouble-click# on this item to reset your character's Inner Ability. Ability ranks will not be reduced by this Circulator. \n#cOnly works on Epic Ability rank or higher \nMaximum final result: Legendary#

string.name: desc
string.value: #cDouble-click# on this item to reset your character's Inner Potentials. This Circulator will not reduce the rank of any Potentials. \n#cOnly works on Epic rank Potentials or higher \nMaximum final result: Legendary#

string.name: desc
string.value: Feeling lucky? Increases the success rate of the next scroll use by 10%.

string.name: autodesc
string.value: \r\n#cIncreases the success rate of your next scroll.\r\n#

string.name: desc
string.value: Increases the chance of success for the next scroll used by #c10%# and #cprotects the item from being destroyed#. \nThe ward's effect will be consumed even after a successful scroll usage. Cannot be used with items that already have Shielding Ward or Lucky Day Scrolls applied. Cannot be used with #cEnhancement Scrolls#.

string.name: autodesc
string.value: \r\n#cIncreases the success rate of your next scroll, and safeguards your item against destruction 1 time.\r\n#

string.name: desc
string.value: A magical shield that protects an item. Using this on a piece of equipment protects it from being destroyed by a failed scroll #c1 time#. Protection also disappears after a successful scroll use, and it#c cannot be used on\nitems that have been successfully enhanced 12 or more times, items that are fully enhanced, or on superior items.# \nCan be used along with #cShield Scrolls and Guardian Scrolls#.

string.name: desc
string.value: A magical shield that protects an item. Using this on a piece of equipment with a #cLevel 105 requirement or less# protects it from being destroyed by a failed scroll #c1 time#. Protection also disappears after a successful scroll use, and it#c cannot be used

string.name: desc
string.value: A #csuperior item# magical shield. Using this on a piece of superior equipment protects it from being destroyed by a failed scroll #c1 time#. Protection also disappears after a successful scroll use, and it #ccannot be used on items that have been successfully enhanced 7 or more times.# \nCan be used along with #cShield Scrolls and Guardian Scrolls#.

string.name: desc
string.value: A magical shield that protects an item. Using this on a piece of equipment protects it from being destroyed by a failed scroll #c1 time#. Protection also disappears after a successful scroll use, and it#c cannot be used on\nitems that have been successfully enhanced 12 or more times or on superior items.# \nCan be used along with #cShield Scrolls and Guardian Scrolls#.

string.name: desc
string.value: A magical shield that protects an item. Using this on a piece of equipment protects it from having its#c upgrade count# reduced by a failed scroll #c1 time#. Protection also disappears after a successful scroll use. \nCan be used along with#c Shielding Wards and Guardian Scrolls#.

string.name: autodesc
string.value: \r\n#cSafeguards your item against upgrade count loss 1 time.\r\n#

string.name: desc
string.value: Using this on a piece of #level 105 or below# equipment protects it from having its #cupgrade count# reduced #c1 time# when a scroll fails. The protective aura also disappears after one use, even if the scroll is successful. \nCan be used along with #cShielding Wards and Guardian Scrolls#.

string.name: autodesc
string.value: \r\n#cSafeguards your item against upgrade count loss 1 time.\r\n#

string.name: desc
string.value: #cResets# all stats on an item, except for Hidden Potentials. Can only be used on equipment. If used on an item that grows, the item may revert to its pre-growth state. \nCannot be used on items that have #cScissors of Karma, Sharing Tag, Item Guard# applied. Additional stats will not be reset.

string.name: autodesc
string.value: \r\n#cResets all stats to their original values (Potential excluded)\r\n#

string.name: desc
string.value: #cResets# all stats on an item, except for Hidden Potentials. Can only be used on equipment #clevels 105 and below#. If used on an item that grows, the item may revert to its pre-growth state. \nCannot be used on items that have #cScissors of Karma, Sharing Tag, Item Guard# applied. Additional stats will not be reset.

string.name: autodesc
string.value: \r\n#cResets all stats to their original values (Potential excluded)\r\n#

string.name: desc
string.value:
A magical shield that protects a scroll when it fails after using it on an #cequipment that can be upgraded#.
Using this on equipment that #ccan be upgraded# will #cpreserve the scroll if its use fails# #c1 time#. The protection effect disappears even after a successful scroll use.

Can be used along with #cShielding Wards and Shield Scrolls#.
Cannot be used on equipment that cannot take scroll upgrades, or pet equipment that has already been upgraded.

string.name: desc
string.value: A magical shield that protects a scroll when it fails. \nUsing this on a piece of #level 105 or below# equipment protects the #cnext scroll from failure# #c1 time#. The protective aura also disappears after one use, even if the scroll is successful.\nCan be used along with #cShielding Wards and Shield Scrolls#.

string.name: desc
string.value: Use this item by double clicking it, then selecting the equip item you want to use it on. Once this scroll is applied, the next time a scroll that changes non-potential stats is used on the item, you will be given the choice of keeping the old stats or accepting the stat changes. Regardless of your choice, the Return Scroll effect will be consumed. This scroll cannot be used in combination with Shield Scrolls, and cannot be used on some items.

string.name: autodesc
string.value: \r\n#cAllows you to choose between the before and after effects of a scroll upon using it.\r\n#

string.name: desc
string.value: Personal fireworks that launch really fast.\r\n#cWhen used, you can get ATT/Magic ATT +20, Weapon DEF +200, or Magic DEF +200. The effect lasts for 10 minutes.#

string.name: desc
string.value:
These fireworks launch really fast. Seriously, it's ridiculous. Grants #cone of 5 effects# when used. Effects last #c30 minutes#. 
ATT & Magic ATT + 20
ATT & Magic ATT + 40
ATT & Magic ATT +80
ATT & Magic ATT +90
ATT & Magic ATT +100

string.name: desc
string.value: Increases the success rate of your next scroll by 10%.\nOnly usable on #cpet equipment#.

string.name: autodesc
string.value: \r\n#cIncreases the success rate of your next scroll.\r\n#

string.name: desc
string.value: A magical shield that protects an item. Using this on a piece of #cpet equipment# protects it from having its #cupgrade count# reduced by a failed scroll #c1 time#. Protection disappears even after a successful scroll use. \nCan be used with a #cGuardian Scroll#.

string.name: autodesc
string.value: \r\n#cSafeguards your item against upgrade count loss 1 time.\r\n#

string.name: desc
string.value: A magical shield that protects a scroll when it fails. \nUsing this on a piece of #cpet equipment# will allow you to keep the #cnext scroll used on it# when it fails #c1 time#. The protection effect disappears even after a successful scroll use.\nCan be used with a #cShield Scroll#.

string.name: desc
string.value: A Wonderberry filled with mysterious energy. #cDouble-click# and Wisp will use their magic to give life to a #cWonder pet or special item#.\n#cYou can obtain a partial refund in your Cash Inventory for pets obtained from the Wonderberry.

string.name: desc
string.value: Take #c2 Royal Style items# to Big Headger along with this sewing machine to have him create #cone piece of Cash equipment or a rare hair coupon with a temporary Masterpiece label#. Masterpiece items come with #cpowerful stats# including Attack Power boosts. These items will match #cthe part and gender of the item that was used as the base# (However, a cape or gloves will result in EITHER cape or gloves). Equipment made in this way #ccannot be traded#.\r\n#cMasterpiece# item rewards change once every season. (Check the NX item announcement on the website for more details.)

string.name: desc
string.value: Take #c2 Royal Style items# to Big Headger along with this sewing machine to have him create #cone piece of Cash equipment or a rare hair coupon with a temporary Masterpiece label#. Masterpiece items come with #cpowerful stats# including Attack Power boosts. These items will match #cthe part and gender of the item that was used as the base# (However, a cape or gloves will result in EITHER cape or gloves). Equipment made in this way #ccan be traded#.\r\n#cPremium Masterpiece# item rewards change once every season. (Check the NX item announcement on the website for more details.)

string.name: desc
string.value: A mysterious gem filled with moonlight energy.\r\nAmplifies the #c2 Wonderberry pets born from Wisp's Wondrous Wonderberry# and turns them into #cpets with even stronger set effects or a Luna Crystal key#. \r\bTradability of the #cLuna Crystal# follows the #ctradability of the base pet.# \r\n#cLuna Crystal# item rewards change once every season. (Check the NX item announcement on the website for more details.)

string.name: desc
string.value: Shout to everyone in the map your character is on with this megaphone.

string.value: Shout to everyone in the map your character is on with this megaphone. Only available for characters that are over Level 10.

string.value: A sweet chocolate in a heart-shaped box. When in possession, a heart will appear above the head of the person that gave the present.

string.value: Sprinkles snow on the map where your character is for 30 seconds. Enter a message of your choice.

string.value: Sprinkles flower on the map where your character is for 30 seconds. Enter a message of your choice.

string.value: Sprinkles bubbles on the map where your character is for 30 seconds. Enter a message of your choice.

string.value: Sprinkle flower petals on the map where your character is for 30 seconds. Enter a message of your choice.

string.value: Rains a sweet shower of candy sprinkles all over the map and displays a message of your choosing for 30 seconds!

string.value: Sprinkles maple leaves on the map where your character is for 30 sec. Enter a message of your choice.

string.value:
Bring this to #cOrbis Plastic Surgery's Plastic Roy#, and you can get 1 #crandom# face makeover. Double-click a coupon in the Cash Shop to #cpreview#. If you equip the #cCold Face# or #cSoulful Face#, you can get the Special Make-up Set through a quest (once only).

#cFaces are obtained at the same rate.#
#cThe Royal Face Coupon rewards change every so often. Find more details on the Cash Item Announcements on the homepage.#

string.name: desc
string.value: This beautiful pearl is enchanted with the ability to turn an #cElf# into a #chuman#. \nIf, however, the lucky user is a #chuman#, #cHigh Flora#, #cVerdant Flora#, or #ceither of the Alpha/Beta Zeros#, they will instead magically sprout #celf ears.#

string.name: desc
string.value:
#cDouble-click# to hide your Dragon's tail.
If you use this while your tail is hidden, it will be revealed again.
#cCan only be used by Kaiser.
The item is consumed after one use. You'll need to purchase another one to change the settings.

string.name: desc
string.value:
#cDouble-click# to hide your Generator Mark.
If you use it while your Generator Mark is hidden, it will be revealed again.

#cCan only be used by Xenon.
Only usable if you selected Generator Mark during character creation.
The item is consumed after one use. You'll need to purchase another one to change the settings.

string.name: desc
string.value:
#cDouble-click# to hide the Demon Markings.
If you use it while your Demon Markings are hidden, they will be revealed again.

#cCan only be used by Demon.
Only usable if you selected Demon Markings during character creation.
The item is consumed after one use. You'll need to purchase another one to change the settings.

string.name: desc
string.value: This beautiful pearl is enchanted with the ability to turn a #cVerdant Flora# into a #chuman#. \nIf, however, the lucky user is a #chuman#, #celf#, #cHigh Flora#, or #ceither of the Alpha/Beta Zeros#, they will instead magically sprout #cVerdant Flora ears.#

string.name: desc
string.value:
#cDouble-click# to hide the Abyssal Ritual.

#cCan only be used by Ark.

string.name: desc
string.value: Use this item to name your pet. Call its name before making an order, and the pet responds much better to your command. \n ex. Lucky, sit!

string.name: desc
string.value: Mysterious water collected from a deep place in Ellinia. Double-click the item to revive a pet that has turned into a doll. You cannot use it on #cMiracle Pets#.

string.name: desc
string.value: Adds the Item Pouch skill to the selected pet.\n#cCan only be used on pets with Meso Magnet.

string.name: desc
string.value: Allows your pet to use HP potions on you when you're hurting. \n#cAvailable to all pets that do not have this skill.#

string.name: desc
string.value: This scroll expands the pet's auto move by 3x.\n#cCan only be used on pets with the Auto Move Skill. Cannot be stacked for use.\nCannot add this skill to Petite pets born from Luna Crystals.#

string.name: desc
string.value: Adds a skill that automatically picks up nearby items and mesos without having to move.\n#cCan be used on pets with Meso Magnet or Item Pouch.

string.name: desc
string.value: Allows your pet to pick up items left by other players. It takes 110 seconds for an item to be released from ownership so your pet can take it.\n#cAvailable to pets with meso and item pick-up skills.#

string.name: desc
string.value: Allows you to stop your pet from picking up certain items. Equipping a pet with this skill will apply the skill to #call equipped pets#. \n#cAvailable to pets with meso and item pick-up skills. Cannot be applied to all items.#

string.name: desc
string.value: Allows your pet to use MP potions on you when you're running dry. \n#cAvailable to all pets that do not have this skill.#

string.name: desc
string.value: Choose one buff skill you want from the Skill window and drag it to the bottom of the Pet Equip tab. Once it's saved, the pet will use the chosen skill automatically. Cannot be used on certain skills, #cincluding hyper skills#.

string.name: desc
string.value: Allows your pet to feed itself using Pet Food from your inventory. Also allows your pet to navigate multi-level maps to pick up mesos and items if it has the #cAuto Move Skill#. \n#cCan be used on all pets.#

string.name: desc
string.value: Your pet will grow when you hunt monsters close to your level. Once it grows large enough, it will cast a mysterious buff every 5 minutes.\n#cCannot be used on Action Pets.#

string.name: desc
string.value: Add an Open General Store skill to the designated pet. You can purchase potions to recover HP & MP, or get throwing stars and bullets. Some maps restrict the use of this item, though.

string.name: desc
string.value: Giving this medicine to a pet with the #cFatten Up# skill will remove the Fatten Up skill.

string.name: desc
string.value: If you use this scroll, your pet will no longer pick up items.\n#cCannot be used on Petite pets born from Luna Crystals.#

string.name: desc
string.value: Use this scroll to disable the pet from automatically feeding the character when the HP reaches critical stage.

string.name: desc
string.value: If you use this scroll, your pet's range of travel will return to the default.\n#cCannot be used on Petite pets born from Luna Crystals.#

string.name: desc
string.value: If you use this scroll, your pet will no longer automatically move to pick up items and mesos.\n#cCannot be used on Petite pets born from Luna Crystals.#

string.name: name
string.value: (-) Delete Pick up Leftover Item & Meso

string.name: desc
string.value: Use this scroll to disable pets from picking up leftover items and mesos, the ones that have been dropped for more than 30 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Contains quite a bit of mesos. User must be above level 15 to purchase sacks.

string.name: desc
string.value: Contains a lot of mesos. User must be above level 15 to purchase sacks.

string.name: desc
string.value: Contains lots and lots of mesos. User must be above level 15 to purchase sacks.

string.name: desc
string.value: Have some sweet teatime with Princess Sharyl. Recovers 100 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Have some sweet teatime with Madeleine the maid. Recovers 100 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: How does a Demon Slayer celebrate a birthday? Do they even have them? 100 HP and 50 MP restored every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Enjoy a special performance by the one and only Mercedes! Recovers 100 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Sit on this chair to become more beautiful with Hilla! Recovers 100 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Show that snow who's boss! Recovers 100 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Fluffy snow bunnies all cozy in the ice box! Recovers 100 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Enjoy a picnic on with the camping bunnies! Recovers 100 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: A massive pearl isn't all that comfy to sit with, but it sure does look fancy! Recovers 100 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: It's an octopus tank in every sense! Recovers 100 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Sit amongst the beautiful lotus flowers of a moonlit garden. Recovers 100 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Break time with your creepy Halloween friends! Recovers 100 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Happy happy fun time with a fluffy, round snow bunny! Recovers 100 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Stay where it's safe! Recovers 100 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Everyone needs to just hang out once in a while. Recovers 100 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: You've eaten a fruit salad before, but have you ever sat on one? Now you can! Recovers 100 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: The perfect place to sweetly dream. Recovers 100 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: A shadow-cloaked tree whose flowers blossom once every thousand years and glow with the light of the moon. Recovers 100 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: A bowler hat and mustache sure to give you a gigglemug. Recovers 100 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Four out of five monkeys agree it's the best flavor. \r\n#cRestores 100 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.#

string.name: desc
string.value: 메이플 월드를 찾아온 특별한 친구, 신한카드 판귄! 10초마다 HP가 100, MP가 50씩 회복된다.

string.name: desc
string.value: Enter at your own peril. Restores 100 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.

string.name: desc
string.value: Every chair is the captain's chair when the captain's in it!! \r\n#cRestores 50 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.#

string.name: desc
string.value: You too can be as happy as a cat sheltered from a spring rain. #cRestores 100 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.#

string.name: desc
string.value: There's no mercy for the prisoner in solitary. #cRestores 100 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.#

string.name: desc
string.value: These meringue cookies are all mine! Nom nom nom! #cRestores 100 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.#

string.name: desc
string.value: Lucid's cherished sparkling Jewel Box. #cRestores 100 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.#

string.name: desc
string.value: Reflect on your deeds beneath the ominous ebony tree. #cRestores 100 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.#

string.name: desc
string.value: Who's the strongest of them all? You are! #cRestores 100 HP and 50 MP every 10 seconds.#

string.name: desc
string.value: This coupon allows users to earn #c2x Exp (double experience)#. The coupon will be activated immediately after purchase, and the double experience effect will be available from 6pm ~ 8pm (Pacific time) for #c7 days#.

string.name: desc
string.value: Please refrain from breaking Maplestory client apart.

string.name: desc
string.value: Hold on to this coupon to #cearn 2x EXP from all monsters#. This coupon is valid for 5 days after the initial possession, and please be aware that if the character has multiple coupons of the same kind, they will all kick in at once.

string.name: desc
string.value: This ticket will enable you to use Gachapon and obtain various items.

string.name: desc
string.value: A ticket needed to enter the event map.

string.name: desc
string.value: The #cOwl of Minerva# represents wisdom, and can be used to search for specific items being bought or sold at the Free Market. #cDisappears after showing the search results. Shows up to 200 results#.

string.name: desc
string.value: The #cOwl of Minerva# represents wisdom, and can be used to search for specific items being bought or sold at the Free Market. #cDisappears after showing the search results. Shows up to 200 results#.

string.name: desc
string.value: #cThe Owl of Rhinne# lets you search for items on the Free Market filtered by stats. However, you can't search by Potential or Bonus Potential. #cIf no equipment meets your search criteria, then you'll get basic Owl of Minerva results.#\r\nThe owl will vanish after showing you the search results. Up to 200 results will be displayed.\r\n#c*Warning: The Owl of Rhinne can only search for equipment.

string.name: desc
string.value: Tasty-looking monkey banana. Only edible for the pet Monkey. \nRecovers entire Fullness. \nIncrease 100 Closeness.

string.name: desc
string.value: A fresh set of batteries. Only usable with the pet Robot.\nRecovers entire Fullness. \nIncrease 100 Closeness.

string.name: desc
string.value: A neatly-packaged dog bone. Only edible for the pet Puppy, Husky and Silver Husky.\nRecovers entire Fullness. \nIncrease 100 Closeness.

string.name: desc
string.value: Bamboo harvested from Ellinia forests. Only edible for the pet Panda.\nRecovers entire Fullness. \nIncrease 100 Closeness.

string.name: desc
string.value: Just caught at Lith Harbor. Only edible for the pet Kitty, Black Pig and Penguin.\nRecovers entire Fullness. \nIncrease 100 Closeness.

string.name: desc

Allows you to create a Lv. 10 character in the same world.

string.name: desc
string.value: Use this to experience the same effect as entering a general store. Can purchase potions to recover HP & MP, throwing stars, and recharge bullets. Some maps restrict the use of this item, though.

string.name: desc
string.value: Use this to access a general store from anywhere. You can purchase potions to recover HP & MP, throwing stars, and recharge bullets. Some maps restrict the use of this item, though.

string.name: desc
string.value: Use this to access a #cGeneral Store# from almost anywhere. You can purchase potions to recover HP & MP, recharge throwing stars and bullets, and more.\n#cUnlimited use# for 30 days.

string.name: desc
string.value: Use this to access the #Storage Keeper# from almost anywhere. You can then move most items into or out of storage.\nCan be used #cwithout restriction# for 30 days.

string.name: desc
string.value: This item lets you shop at a very special General Store when you use it. You can purchase Nero's exclusive special items and some HP or MP Recovery Potions, as well as recharge your stars and bullets.\nNero's exclusive special items include #chugely discounted Power Elixirs, and Get Rich Chairs#. However, #cspecial items are limited in number#, and you can not use Cat Merchant Nero in some areas. \nExclusive items per use: #cPower Elixir x2700, Get Rich Chair x1#

string.value: A coupon that you can exchange for a ticket which allows you to enter the Zakum dungeon 1 more time past the daily entrance limit. Can only be used if your character has fought Zakum at least once. Also grants a teleport scroll to the 'Entrance to Zakum's Altar'. Maximum 5 additional entries each day.

string.name: desc
string.value: Exchange for a Pet Equipment Guardian Scroll by double-clicking on this. Using this on a piece of #cpet equipment# will allow you to keep the #cnext scroll used on the equipment# when it fails #c1 time#. Protection also disappears after a successful scroll use. \nCan be used along with #cSafety Scrolls#.

string.name: desc
string.value: Exchange for a Pet Equipment Safety Scroll by double-clicking on it. Using this on a piece of #cpet equipment# will protect it from #closing available upgrades# when it fails #c1 time#. Protection also disappears after a successful scroll use. \nCan be used along with #cGurdian Scrolls#.

#cDouble-click the scroll in your Cash tab to move it to your Use tab.# 
#cCannot be used with Lucky Day Scroll.#

string.value:
Adds 3 lines of potential for regular equipment without deducting from the available upgrade count. 
Success Rate: 100%. 
#cOnly works on regular items.# 
#cDouble-click the scroll in your Cash tab to move it to your Use tab.#

string.name: desc
string.value: Adds another Bonus Potential line to a piece of equipment with 1 or 2 existing Bonus Potentials. \r\nSuccess rate: 100%.\r\n#cDouble-click the coupon in your Cash tab to move it to your Use tab.#

string.name: desc
string.value:
Adds 3 lines of Bonus Potential to a regular piece of equipment with Potential but no Bonus Potentials. 
Does not deduct from the available upgrade count. 
Success Rate: 100%. 
#cDouble-click the scroll in your Cash tab to move it to your Use tab.#

string.value: #cDouble-click this coupon to get one random cash item from Big Headger#. Some of these #cspecial monthly cash equipment# items come with #cpowerful bonus stats# like ATT. #cCash items obtained from Royal Style Coupons that are purchased with Nexon Cash# can be exchanged once if they are not used. Exchanges will be restricted in Reboot World.)\r\n\r\n#cDouble-click the Coupon item# to preview the item. Royal Style Coupons are used in the order that they are stored in your inventory. #cZeroes# will get a male or unisex outfit regardless of the gender of the character opening the box.

string.value:
같은 월드 내에 60레벨 메카닉 캐릭터를 생성한다.
#c 60레벨 장비, 소비 아이템, 10만 메소 포함.
캐릭터 슬롯 확장 효과 포함.
* 주의!
캐릭터 슬롯이 최대로 확장되어 있을 경우, 캐릭터 슬롯 확장 효과는 적용되지 않는다.
2015년 2월 28일 23시 59분 까지 사용가능.#

The Navy Sealor package containing 3 Navy Sealor pets!

Equip Navy Sealor pets to get the #cMarine Elite# skill, which grows stronger as you equip more Navy Sealor pets (max: 3)#.

string.value: A throwing star make to look like Mr. Puff, with its huffy puffy cheeks resembling that of a tasty-looking steamed bun. Thrown with a #cthrowing star# to have the Mr. Puff effect.\n\nItem cannot be removed.

string.name: desc
string.value: A mischievous ball that has gained sentience, and now lives to be thrown for massive damage. Tremendous striking power! Equips over #cThrowing Stars#!

string.name: desc
string.value: Beautiful shooting star. Mask over #cThrowing Star#.\n\nItem cannot be removed.

string.name: desc

string.name: desc
string.value: A gift box that can be freely thrown around. Using the #cThrowing Star# will create an orbital effect.\n\nThis item cannot be deleted.

string.name: desc
string.value: Set up this special store on the Free Market, and this Elf, working as the Hired Merchant, will sell the items for the owner, even if the owner does not log on to the game.

string.name: desc

string.name: desc
string.value: Set up this store on the Free Market, and this Black Friday Shop will sell items for you, even while you are logged out. If you list items that #cyou wish to purchase#, another player can sell those items at this shop. #cWhen an item is sold, you will be notified via chat window.# \n#cUnpurchaseable Items#: Equipment items and cash items with expirations.

string.name: desc
string.value: A girl that sells your items for you in the Free Market, even when you are not logged in.

string.name: desc
string.value:
Allows you to #cteleport to most other locations through the World Map [W]#. 
Also allows you to #cmove to a map where a specified character is# if they are in the same world and channel. Excluding maps that are restricted from teleporting into, up to #c13# maps can be registered.
#c<Towns that you can teleport to>#
#cHenesys, Ellinia, Perion, Kerning City, Nautilus, Orbis, Ludibrium, Aquarium, Leafre, Mu Lung, Ariant, Edelstein#. This item can be used repeatedly until it expires.

string.name: desc
string.value:

Also allows you to #cmove to a map where a specified character is# if they are in the same world and channel. Excluding maps that are restricted from teleporting into, up to #c13# maps can be registered.
#c<Towns that you can teleport to>#
#cHenesys, Ellinia, Perion, Kerning City, Nautilus, Orbis, Ludibrium, Aquarium, Leafre, Mu Lung, Ariant, Edelstein#.

string.name: desc
string.value: Remembers 5 maps of your choice. This rock will enable you to #cteleport to the map you remembered#. It can even allow you to #cmove to the map where a certain character is#, provided that the person is in the same channel at the same world. This item cannot be used to teleport in between continents. Note: This item will disappear after one use.

string.name: desc
string.value: A miraculous cube that resets #cthe potential and number of potential stats# on any piece of equipment that is Rare, Epic, or Unique.\nThis cube #ccannot be used on Legendary items.#This cube can only be used on items with revealed potentials.

string.name: desc
string.value:
This otherworldly cube has a chance to change the number of potentials a piece of equipment possesses. 
#c Only usable on items from Rare to Legendary#
#cMax potentials: 3.#
#cGives 1 Super Miracle Cube Fragment when used. Be careful to make sure your USE tab is not full before use! #

string.name: desc
string.value:
A mystical cube that automatically sets new Potentials in equipment items. When the cube is used, #citems with 2 Potential stat lines will display 4 stat lines, and items with 3 stat lines will show 6 lines#. You may choose the lines to apply to the item. 
Can only be used on Rare to Legendary rank items that already have Potentials. 
#cMax Rank Results: Legendary# 
Potentials are automatically set and max potential rank is not guaranteed.

string.name: desc
string.value: #cDouble-click# and select a piece of equipment with less than 3 Potential lines to add 1 additional line of Potential.

string.name: desc
string.value: You can exchange this for 8 Gachapon Tickets if you visit The Great Gachapierrot in a town.

string.name: desc
string.value: A Starter Pack containing 4 fixed Familiars. Only one can be purchased per account. This pack commemorates the introduction of Monster Familiars.\nContains 4 fixed Familiars: #c(Pig, Cloud Fox, Terrified Wild Boar and Red Drake# (Untradable)\n#cOnly one can be purchased per account#

string.name: desc
string.value: A pack that gives out 3 random Familiars total: 2 common and 1 uncommon or better. \n#cThe contents are determined by the system, and a Rare item is not always given. The chances of obtaining better items are not affected by the amount purchased. #

string.name: desc
string.value:
This booster pack gives out 3 Rare or higher Familiars. 
Level: Contains 3 Rare Familiars - one below Lv. 50, one below Lv. 100, and one Lv. 100 or higher. There is a small chance that a Lv. 1 - 200 Legendary Familiar might come out instead of the Lv. 100 or higher Rare Familiar. 
Rank: 1 Normal, 1 Normal or Special, and 1 Special or better. 
#cYou will receive a Volatile Legends Familiar Stamp upon using the item. Collect 20 of them to receive a Volatile Familiar Ticket that will allow you to get a Legendary Familiar. #The contents are determined by the system, and a Rare item is not always given. The chances of obtaining better items are not affected by the amount purchased.

string.value: This scroll will enable you to change your character name to something totally new! Please be aware that the character must be at level 10 or higher to be eligible for the name change and the new name should be an acceptable new name that has passed the name check. The name-change will occur during the following server check, and you will then be restricted from changing names for one month. Use this coupon before 10/27/2016 to change your name. This coupon cannot be used on or after 10/27 and will not be refunded.

string.name: desc
string.value:
#c*Warning: If you do not have an empty Character slot, it cannot be used.#

If you are over #cLevel 30#, a new Level 30 character can be created in your world.You can choose one of the following classes #c(Warrior, Magician, Thief, Bowman and Pirate)# at #c1st Job status#.

Only the amount of AP needed for each respective 1st jobs have been allocated and the rest of AP and SP can be distributed to your liking.#cBasic equips and items# needed for travel are also provided.

string.name: desc
string.value:
Allows you to create a character of any currently available class, with the exception of Hayato, Kanna, Cygnus Knights, Xenon, Shade, Zero, Beast Tamer, Kinesis, Ark, Illium, and Cadena. 
Can only be purchased using a character that's Lv. 50 or higher, and there must be a free character slot on that world. After purchase, a character with an item that can level it up to Lv. 50 is created in the world where the purchase was made.
On the character screen, you will see a "Create Character" card.
#cBe careful when using the level-up item, as SP (Skill Points) cannot be obtained if you do not do the job advancements.# You must use the character card in the character creation window before you can purchase another.

string.name: desc
string.value:
Allows you to create a character of any currently available class, with the exception of Hayato, Kanna, Cygnus Knights, Xenon, Shade, Zero, Beast Tamer, Kinesis, Ark, Illium, and Cadena. 
Can only be purchased using a character that's Lv. 100 or higher, and there must be a free character slot on that world. After purchase, a character with an item that can level it up to Lv. 100 is created in the world where the purchase was made.
On the character screen, you will see a "Create Character" card.
#cBe careful when using the level-up item, as SP (Skill Points) cannot be obtained if you do not do the job advancements.# You must use the character card in the character creation window before you can purchase another.

string.name: desc
string.value:
Allows you to create a character of any currently available class, with the exception of Hayato, Kanna, Cygnus Knights, Xenon, Shade, Zero, Beast Tamer, Kinesis, Ark, Illium, and Cadena. 
Can only be purchased using a character that's Lv. 150 or higher, and there must be a free character slot on that world. After purchase, a character with an item that can level it up to Lv. 150 is created in the world where the purchase was made.
On the character screen, you will see a "Create Character" card.
#cBe careful when using the level-up item, as SP (Skill Points) cannot be obtained if you do not do the job advancements.# You must use the character card in the character creation window before you can purchase another.

string.name: desc
string.value:
#c*Warning : If all 12 character slots are full, it cannot be used.#

This package has the #cMaple Life item plus an Extra Character Slot coupon.#Using this item will automiatically create a new slot.

If you are over #cLevel 30#, a new Level 30 character can be created in your world. You can choose one of the following classes #c(Warrior, Magician, Thief, Bowman and Pirate)# at #c1st Job status.#

Only the amount of AP needed for each respective 1st jobs have been allocated and the rest of AP and SP can be distributed to your liking.#cBasic equips and items# needed for travel are also provided.

string.name: desc
string.value: The box will give you one random Equip item. The box contains only permanent items, which can be traded to other players as long as you haven't equipped them.

string.name: desc
string.value: Provides potential for regular equipment without deducting from the available upgrade count. It can only be used on items without potential.

string.name: desc
string.value: When you purchase this item, you will be able to equip an additional pendant slot item. #cHowever, characters will not be able to equip more than 1 Special Equipment Item#

string.name: desc
string.value: Allows you to equip 1 additional pendant for 90 days. #cHowever, you may still only equip 1 of any unique-equip item.#

string.name: desc
string.value: Using this coupon will unlock 1 face slot in the Beauty Salon.

string.name: desc
string.value: Using this coupon will unlock 1 hair slot in the Beauty Salon.

string.name: desc
string.value: Temper the equipped item with Vicious' Hammer to increase available upgrade by 1. It can be used maximum 2 times per item. Warning: You cannot use it on the Horntail Necklace.

string.name: desc
string.value: Can equip items that are 5 levels above your current level.

string.name: desc
string.value: This winning spell from Vega enables a 30% success rate on a 10% scroll. Please check the scroll description to confirm that Vega's Spell is available for the scroll you choose.

string.name: desc
string.value: This winning spell from Vega enables a 90% success rate on a 60% scroll. Please check the scroll description to confirm that Vega's Spell is available for the scroll you choose.

string.name: desc
string.value:
Has a 100% chance of raising the Master Level of the #cMagic Guard# skill to 20.
Job: Evan
Condition: Skill must be at least level 5
#cOnly usable once per character

string.name: desc
string.value:
Has a 100% chance of raising the Master Level of the #cMagic Booster# skill to 20.
Job: Evan
Condition: Skill must be at least level 5
#cOnly usable once per character

string.name: desc
string.value:
Has a 100% chance of raising the Master Level of the #cCritical Magic# skill to 15.
Job: Evan
Condition: Skill must be at least level 5
#cOnly usable once per character

string.name: desc
string.value: If your scroll fails, you can use this item to prevent an upgrade slot from being used.

string.name: desc
string.value: Thomas delivers available quests to you, no matter how far you are from the quest giver! (Not available for certain quests.)

string.name: desc
string.value: Alice lets you turn in quests you've completed, even when you're nowhere near the NPC you're supposed to turn it in to! (Not available for certain quests.)

string.name: desc
string.value: Can only be used in the Cake vs. Pie battle map #cwhen in the attacking faction.# Summons #c10 additional monsters# on the map.

string.name: desc
string.value: Can only be used in the Cake vs. Pie battle map #cwhen in the defending faction.# Summons #ca Mini Barricade# at the player's location to block monsters.

string.name: desc
string.value: Using this drink will reset your fatigue to 0%. You can only use it when you have more than 0% fatigue.

string.name: desc
string.value: A coupon that that can be exchanged for a 1.5x EXP coupon (4 hrs) when you double-click it.

string.name: desc
string.value: Change your hairstyle to #cStarling Hair# by #cdouble-clicking# this item.

string.name: desc
string.value: Change your hairstyle to #cCrow Hair# by #cdouble-clicking# this item.

string.name: desc
string.value: By double-clicking Coupon, you can obtain various chair items.

string.name: desc
string.value:
Perfume for Pets.
The buff you get will depend on the number of pets summoned when the perfume is first used.
1: PAD, MAD +3 for 2 hours
2: PAD, MAD +8 for 2 hours
3: PAD, MAD +15 for 2 hours
This buff stacks with other buffs, but not with other Pet Perfume buffs.

string.name: desc
string.value:
Perfume for Pets.
The buff you get will depend on the number of pets summoned when the perfume is first used.
1: Attack Speed Grade +2 for 2 hours
2: Attack Speed Grade +3 for 2 hours
3: Attack Speed Grade +4 for 2 hours
This buff stacks with other buffs, but not with other Pet Perfume buffs.

string.name: desc
string.value:
Perfume for Pets.
The buff you get will depend on the number of pets summoned when the perfume is first used.
1: Levels of all skills currently in possession +3 for 2 hours
2: Levels of all skills currently in possession +4 for 2 hours
3: Levels of all skills currently in possession +5 for 2 hours
This buff stacks with other buffs, but not with other Pet Perfume buffs.

string.name: desc
string.value:
Perfume for Pets.
The buff you get will depend on the number of pets summoned when the perfume is first used.
1: STR +3 for 2 hours
2: STR +6 for 2 hours
3: STR +10 for 2 hours
This buff stacks with other buffs, but not with other Pet Perfume buffs.

string.name: desc
string.value:
Perfume for Pets.
The buff you get will depend on the number of pets summoned when the perfume is first used.
1: INT +3 for 2 hours
2: INT +6 for 2 hours
3: INT +10 for 2 hours
This buff stacks with other buffs, but not with other Pet Perfume buffs.

string.name: desc

Perfume for Pets.

This buff stacks with other buffs, but not with other Pet Perfume buffs.

This buff stacks with other buffs, but not with other Pet Perfume buffs.

string.name: desc
string.value: Booster Pack with a chance to grant a Sengoku Familiar. Use to obtain one random Familiar out of 29, including the mythical Ranmaru.

string.name: desc
string.value: This device can detect the special materials in treasure chests. You have to at least be on the same map to get a good location.

string.name: desc
string.value: Contains one random Cash Shop discount coupon, ranging from 5% to 30% off.\nThe coupon must be used within 7 days.

string.name: desc
string.value: Obtain one permanent Honey Butterfly mount, raised during the Honey Butterfly event.

string.name: desc
string.value: #cDouble-click# and answer questions to get a specialized #cDemon pet# based on your answers.

string.name: desc
string.value: This box will give you one random damage skin. These damage skin coupons are permanent items and can be traded to other players, but they are consumed when you use them.

string.name: desc
string.value: This box will give you one random damage skin. These damage skin coupons are permanent items and can be traded to other players, but they are consumed when you use them.

string.name: desc
string.value: 巨人都是相对的！虽在冒险岛里是二头身，但小人国中我是巨人！！用格利佛特效炫出你的巨大化身躯。

string.name: desc
string.value: 巨人都是相对的！虽在冒险岛里是二头身，但小人国中我是巨人！！用格利佛特效炫出你的巨大化身躯。

string.name: desc
string.value: #cDouble-click# to receive either a chair, a mount, or a damage skin. The only way to find out is to #cdouble-click#!

string.name: desc
string.value: A box that will give the person that opens it a random enhancement item. #cDouble-click# to receive your item.

string.name: desc
string.value: #cランダムボックスをダブルクリックすると#、#cランダム#でアイテムを1つ獲得できる。

string.name: desc
string.value: Use the item to get 10 Fishing Coins.

string.name: desc
string.value: Use the item to get 50 Fishing Coins.

string.name: desc
string.value: Use the item to get 100 Fishing Coins.

string.name: desc
string.value: Increases EXP earned from quests to 2x the normal amount. Effect begins immediately.

string.name: desc
string.value: Condensed energy from the edge of the cosmos that randomizes the stats and potentials of any #cNebulite# it touches.

string.name: desc
string.value: #cPermanently removes# the nebulite from the equipment socket. However, removed nebulites will #cdisappear.

string.name: desc
string.value: Solidifies the effects of Star or Supernova Dust by locking the Core's current stats for 30 days. You can lock the current configuration for up to 365 days max by using more Stellar Cosmic Dust Solidifier. \r\n#cWarning: The stat lock will be overwritten if you use an item to reconfigure the Core's stats.#

string.name: desc
string.value: Sprinkle some of this dust on Jett's Core to randomly reconfigure its stats to become more powerful. If Jett is at least Lv. 120 and the Core has been completed, this dust also has a chance to increase stat ranks.

string.name: desc
string.value: Sprinkle some of this dust on Jett's Core to reconfigure its stats to the highest possible.

string.name: desc
string.value: 여와의 주물이었던 황토가 담긴 항아리. 보합에 뿌리면 최고 등급의 능력치로 재설정 해준다. 협객의 레벨이 120 레벨이 넘어 양괘일 경우라도, 등급이 조정되지는 않는다.

string.name: desc
string.value: Rotates the Core's stat distribution clockwise once.

string.name: desc
string.value:
Combines potions and consumable items to refill HP & MP completely with each use.
- #cRight-click# the Potion Pot to open the genie window.
- Drag HP or MP recovery items into the item window.
- Check #cAUTOFILL# to charge the pot automatically when you loot compatible items.
- Equip to a quickslot, or to a pet's Auto HP/Auto MP Potion Pouch.
- Once expired, the pot remains in inventory.
- Use a #cRust Remover# to extend the pot's duration by 30 days.
- Use a #cPot Embiggener# to increase the pot's capacity.

string.name: desc
string.value: Special potion that recovers just enough HP and MP. Right-click to open the pot. Drag & drop potions into the window to charge up the Potion Pot. Activate "AUTOFILL" option to charge the Potion Pot automatically as you get potions while training. If you also want to autofil your pot with Elixirs, check the "Elixir" option. You can use a Rust Remover to renew your pot once it expires. You can also purchase a Pot Embiggener if you want to add more space.

string.name: desc
string.value: Use to permanently increase the Potion Pot's Storage capacity by one level(1000000). Hover your cursor over the Potion Pot's icon to view current capacity. Maximum capacity level: 9(10000000).

string.name: desc

string.name: desc
string.value: New record-holders can share the fruits of their labor! Increases Attack Power by 30 and doubles EXP for 15 min. This effect stacks with other buffs. Enter an inspirational message to send out to the world!

string.name: msg
string.value: %s shared the fruits of their labor, and an inspirational message: '%s'

string.name: desc
string.value: World record holders can share an inspirational message! Increases Attack Power by 80 and doubles EXP for 30 min. This effect stacks with other buffs. Enter a message to send out to the world!

string.name: desc
string.value: Gives you a mouth full of chocolate.

string.name: desc
string.value: Causes chocolate to dribble from your mouth.

string.name: desc
string.value: #cDouble-click# to activate. Gives you a #c50% chance to prevent Choco Frenzy from being triggered by a Choco Syringe# one time.

string.name: desc
string.value: #cDouble-click# to activate. After entering a Choco Frenzy, #crestores 80% of your lost Choco Power#. Triggers once. This buff vanishes at midnight.

string.name: desc

string.name: desc

string.name: desc

string.name: desc
string.value: This chocolate smells suspicious.\r\nEating it could make you sick.\r\n#c'This chocolate gains its bitter taste from the high cacao content.'#

string.name: desc
string.value: The rooster surges onto the screen to deliver an important message. Use this item to display your character and a message to the entire world.
